notificationId.description: The unique identifier for the notification.

title.description: The title or subject of the notification.

message.description: The content or message body of the notification.

status.description: The read status of the notification.

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user who received the notification.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the notification was created.

type.description: The type of the notification, such as order or system.

metadata.description: Additional metadata related to the notification, such as order details.

orderId.description: The associated order ID, if applicable.

shippingProvider.description: The shipping provider for the associated order, if applicable.
